arm_group.description: Comparison of the four screening score

brief_summary.textblock:
Comparison of preoperative screening score for OSA. In a preoperative population, comparison
      of the STOP-BANG, DES-OSA, P-SAP and OSA50 score.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Preoperative Screening Score for Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA)

detailed_description.textblock:
Comparison of preoperative screening score for OSA (Obstructive Sleep Apnea). In a
      preoperative population, comparison of the STOP-BANG, DES-OSA, P-SAP and OSA50 score.

      Comparison between scores and if applied with the results of a polysomnography (PSG).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  All adults patients (> 18 years) performing a preoperative assessment at the ASTES
             Doctor's Office (ASTES is an acronym with the name of Medical Doctors involved in
             this office)

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients < 18 years

study_pop.textblock: Adult patients (> 18 years) presenting for preoperative assessment before surgery at SLBO.

intervention.description: Comparison of the four screening score, for patient making a preoperative assessment for SLBO (clinique Saint-Luc de BOuge)
intervention.intervention_name: Comparison of the four screening score

clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Preoperative Screening Score for OSA

primary_outcome.description: Comparison of the result of the DES-OSA score with results of previously describes scores (STOP-BANG, OSA50 and P-SAP).
primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with a positive DES-OSA score

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: For the patients with a positive DES-OSA score (and/or a positive results for the other screening scores: STOP-BANG, P-SAP and OSA50): we will make a PSG. After this one, we will compare the result of the DES-OSA score and the result of the PSG (especially AHI: Apnea Hypopnea Index)
secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with a positive DES-OSA score and a positive PSG (PolySomnoGraphy)

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
